__e: I'II have a double whisky in a tall glass with some ice.
He comes in, looks rattled. Orders a double Jack, neat.
I gave up Double scotches on the rocks Six years ago.
No, I think I'll have a double Scotch.
You sell me my double Scotch, and you sell my friend his double Scotch but instead of putting his on his tray you put it on mine and I'll pay you for both.
The guys paid double the price for our neighbor's house.
You'll buy back the bullets and sell them to me at double the price.
I'll sell you the painting... for double what I paid.
